DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether micronized trans-resveratrol improve clinical ( excessive hair , menstrual cycle ) , endocrine ( androgen ) metabolic ( lipid , marker systemic inflammation ) woman polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Micronized Trans-resveratrol Treatment Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) Patients
DOC.criteria: PCO Androgen Excess Society criterion : hyperandrogenism ( hirsutism ) / hyperandrogenemia ( testosterone > 70ng/dl ) and/or oligomenorrhea ( < 8 spontaneous menses per year ) and/or polycystic ovarian morphology ultrasound Normal prolactin , TSH , 17OH progesterone No evidence androgen produce malignancy , Cushing 's syndrome acromegaly Age 1840 Use oral contraceptive and/or steroid hormone 3 month prior study
